quote: 'Son, the greatest trick the Devil pulled was convincing the world there was only one of him.' - David Wong

name: Summon Matador
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
quote:
Congrats on summoning the first boss, hey? The next one boss will be the White Rider. Try to annex more cities with this boss in order to summon quickly.

Bosses will not be displayed in the tech tree nor the civilopedea, so you have to discover it yourself.

name: Summon White Rider
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
quote: Second Boss unlocked! Just for reminding, when these Bosses die, they will NOT return the souls. So you'd better be careful!

name: Summon Red Rider
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
quote: Now the third one. Since you can't check its detailed information in the wiki, why not check its promotion page?

quote: The forth one. I can't think of more tips, so I'll leave it blank here (at least for now) :D
